en: The time is 10:05. What time will it be after 25 minutes?
zh: 现在是 10:05，再过 25 分钟是几点？

en: The time is 5:55. What time will it be after 40 minutes?
zh: 现在是 5:55，再过 40 分钟是几点？
把 6 米 30 厘米换算成厘米。
把 7 米 75 厘米换算成厘米。

en: A shop had 514 items. After selling 172, 3 helpers shared the rest equally. How many items did each helper get?
zh: 商店有 514 件物品，卖出 172 件后，剩下的由 3 个人平均分。每人分到多少件？
